title: Lo vah leh hal zawh hnuin
lyrics:
Lo vah leh hal zawh hnuin
Buh chite kan tuh fo;
Tuh chung pawhin, mihringin
Kan hlawktir thei thin lo.
Kan Pathianin a tir thin,
Ni sa leh ruah sur te,
Mihringin kan tuh zawng hi,
A hlawktir tamna tur.

Thil tha kan neih zawng zawng,
Kan Pathian pek a ni,
Min khawngaih em avang hianin,
I lawm ang u.

Kan ramah leh ram danga
Thil tha awm zawng zawng hi
Kan Pathian siam vek a ni,
Min khawngaih avangin,
Sate mah a chawm thin hi,
Sava, rannung nen;
Pathian fate kan ni si,
Min chawm lo thei ang em?

Aw Lal Pathian, kan Pa ber,
Lawm thu kan hrilh a che;
Tuh hun, seng hun, ei turte,
Min pek thin avangin.
I hnena pe leh chhawngin
Kan neih zawng zawng kan hlan;
Kan rilru zawng zawng pawhin
Kan hmangaih fo vang che.
